article_title: DC Devotes $29K per Student Each Year. What if Parents Controlled That Money?
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: D.C. revenue exceeds $29,000 per pupil every year while graduation rates hover at about 64 percent and only one-third of its fourth graders read at a proficient level.
